shibboleth.model

Interface GithubGraph

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountGraph, GephiGraph

    public interface GithubGraph

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(SimpleRepo repo)
      Add repo to the graph, if the graph already contains this repo, nothing is added.
      void add(SimpleUser user)
      Add user to the graph, if the graph already contains this user, nothing is added.
      void addContribution(Contribution c)
      Add a contribution to the graph.
      void export(File file)
      Export the graph to the given file.
      boolean remove(String nodeName)
      Remove node with the given node name.
      void removeAll()
      Remove all nodes from the graph.
      void setColor(String nodeName, Color color)
      Set color to a node.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(SimpleUser user)
        Add user to the graph, if the graph already contains this user, nothing is added.
        Parameters:
        user - The user.

      • add

        void add(SimpleRepo repo)
        Add repo to the graph, if the graph already contains this repo, nothing is added.
        Parameters:
        repo - The repo.

      • setColor

        void setColor(String nodeName,
            Color color)
        Set color to a node. If color is null, standard colors are being applied.
        Parameters:
        nodeName - The name of the node
        color - The color

      • remove

        boolean remove(String nodeName)
        Remove node with the given node name. Removes neighbors of the given node if their degree will become equal to 0; Generally speaking the node name is either a Github user name or a Github repo name.
        Parameters:
        nodeName -
        Returns:
        Whether a node was indeed removed from the graph.

      • removeAll

        void removeAll()
        Remove all nodes from the graph.

      • addContribution

        void addContribution(Contribution c)
        Add a contribution to the graph. The user and the repo of the contribution are added as well.
        Parameters:
        c -

      • export

        void export(File file)
        Export the graph to the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - The path
